Notes: In the scenario before the reform, only motorbikes with engines above 200 c.c. are taxed with the impuesto nacional al consumo, INC (an extra 8%). In order to find the revenue before the reform, we need to identify which purchases involved motorbikes above the threshold, and that cannot be achieved using the survey directly, nor the fact that purchases involved new or second-hand motorbikes. I searched for prices for the most expensive motorbike below 200cc and the cheapest moto above 200cc to find a reasonable value that minimizes potential biases: adjusted by inflation, this value is 9 million, so for purchases of motorbikes above this unitary value the rate will be 27% (later we can define a range of parameters, not only for this sales taxes, but for the others defined in the tax code). The after reform scenario is easier to simulate: all purchases are taxed at the 27% rate.
